queries.tonnagePerTruckPerDay: SELECT TruckId, DATE(ArrivalTime) AS Date, SUM(NettWeight) AS Tonnage FROM Assignments WHERE DATE(ArrivalTime) = ? AND DATE(DepartureTime) = ? GROUP BY TruckId, DATE(ArrivalTime)
queries.averageTurnAroundTimePerHaulier: SELECT HaulierId, AVG(TIMESTAMPDIFF(HOUR, ArrivalTime, DepartureTime)) AS AverageTurnAroundTime FROM Assignments GROUP BY HaulierId
queries.averageTurnAroundTimePerDriver: SELECT DriverId, AVG(TIMESTAMPDIFF(HOUR, ArrivalTime, DepartureTime)) AS AverageTurnAroundTime FROM Assignments GROUP BY DriverId
